elements.text: You are on your way to a nice dinner with friends. When getting dressed, you worry that putting on your favorite shirt will be a challenge because the buttons are too small. After trying for nearly 10 minutes to get your shirt on, you realize you have...

elements.name: Trouble Getting Dressed_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
